name: Remember (itch) (colorthebooks)
description:
"When I was a child, I loved to twist my toys as far as they would go. Then, twist them a little further..."

Remember is a first-person exploration game set in a land between life and death. Trapped in this purgatory, you must make the choice: find your memories and piece together the life you left behind, or embrace eternity, fulfill your destiny, and destroy the very heavens themselves. 

Features:

  • Explore the mysterious world. Travel through a mysterious setting filled with maze-like challenges and relentless enemies.
  • Uncover the lore. Discover what happened to the Passing Lands through environmental storytelling and unique twists.
  • Overcome your amnesia. Your memories have been scattered across the Passing Lands. Find them in order to uncover what led to your arrival here.
  • Unveil the secrets. Finding all of the secret items will unlock a secret ending and that will leave you breathless.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Shift - Run
  • Ctl - Crouch
  • Space - Jump
  • Esc - Quit
  • R - Reset Game
